name: 36 (Heuserus)
description:
How To Play

The dice on the grid need to sum up to the number floating above. Very Simple.

However, this might get increasingly harder to accomplish with changing terrain and an increasing number of dice.

Best of Luck. 

Controls

You can use either WASD or the Arrow Keys to move. Up means Up+Right on the shifted Grid.

Performance

If performance in browser is lacking for you, download the .exe and try it local. It is not browser optimized.
